H0.text: what countries does nafta include. Mexico

H1.text: what countries does nafta include. United States

H2.text: what countries does nafta include. Costa Rica

H3.text: what countries does nafta include. Canada

A4.text: the North American Free Trade Agreement (Spanish: Tratado de Libre Comercio de América del Norte, TLCAN; French: Accord de libre-échange nord-américain, ALÉNA), referred to colloquially in the Anglosphere as NAFTA, ( NAF-tə) was an agreement signed by Canada, Mexico, and the United States

A5.text: the North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA) expanded the free-trade zone to include Mexico in 1994

A6.text: the Canada – United States Free Trade Agreement (FTA) of 1988 eliminated tariffs between the two countries
